# playerID

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for a player of the game.

## Declaration

```swift
var playerID: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Never display the player identifier to the player. Use it only to identify a player in your code.

## Identifying the player

- **gamePlayerID**: A unique identifier for a player of the game.
- **teamPlayerID**: A unique identifier for a player of all the games that you distribute using your developer account.
- **scopedIDsArePersistent()**: Returns a Boolean value depending on whether the player identifiers are persistent across game instances or unique to the game instance.
- **GKPlayerIDNoLongerAvailable**: A constant for a player ID that’s no longer available.
